blocks.home.hero.title: Driving Awareness and Participation in Space Exploration as
blocks.home.hero.subtitle: Programs, events, and experiences designed to connect more people to space exploration—through hands-on learning, expert-led gatherings, and community momentum.
blocks.home.tiles.1.title: Expert Events
blocks.home.tiles.1.body: Launch viewings, talks, and meetups with clear takeaways and room to ask real questions.
blocks.home.tiles.2.title: Technical Scholarships
blocks.home.tiles.3.title: International Competition
blocks.home.tiles.3.body: Friendly, global formats that reward curiosity, craft, and scientific storytelling.
blocks.home.tiles.4.title: First Hand Experience
blocks.home.tiles.4.body: Trips and on-site experiences—built for memory, context, and real-world inspiration.

blocks.home.involved.title: Get involved
blocks.home.involved.kicker: A few simple ways to plug in—then iterate from here.
blocks.home.involved.1.title: Join an event
blocks.home.involved.1.body: Pick an upcoming event below and start with a single great experience.
blocks.home.involved.2.title: Support scholarships
blocks.home.involved.2.body: Help fund technical learning and participation for students and early-career builders.
blocks.home.involved.3.title: Partner with Spacepoint
blocks.home.involved.3.body: Bring an expert, a venue, or a community—then build a repeatable program together.
